sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-navigation-drawer
    app
    permanent
    :mini-variant.sync="mini"

    >
    <!-- :mini-variant.sync="toggleDrawer" -->
    <!-- v-model="toggleDrawer"    -->
    <v-list
      dense>
      <!-- <v-list-item class="px-0"> -->
      <v-list-item class="px-0">
        <v-list-item-avatar class="ml-2" v-if="mini">
          <v-img 
            contain
            class="imgCursor"
            src="../assets/logoMiniHWL.png"
            >
          </v-img>          
        </v-list-item-avatar>
        <v-list-item-avatar class="ml-10" tile width="150" height="50" v-else>
          <v-img 
            contain
            src="../assets/logoHWL.png"
            >
          </v-img>          
        </v-list-item-avatar>

        <!-- <v-list-item-title></v-list-item-title> -->

        <v-btn
          icon
          @click.stop="mini = !mini"
        >
          <v-icon>mdi-chevron-left</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-list-item>
    </v-list>

    <v-divider></v-divider>

    <v-list
      nav 
      dense>
      <v-list-group
        value="true"
        prepend-icon="mdi-account-circle">
        <template v-slot:activator>
          <v-list-item-title>
            <v-list-item-content
            AFR
          </v-list-item-title>
        </template>

      </v-list-group>
    </v-list>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>

<script>
import { mapState } from 'vuex'

export default {
    data () {
      return {
        selectedItem: 0,
        mini: true,
        items: [
          { text: "AFR", icon: "mdi-airplane" },
          { text: "SFR", icon: "mdi-ferry" },
          { text: "TRNG", icon: "mdi-truck" },
          { text: "TRIG", icon: "mdi-truck-fast" },
          { text: "TRNF", icon: "mdi-truck-flatbed" },
          { text: "CLC", icon: "mdi-warehouse" }
        ]
  }
},

computed: {
    // ...mapState('custom', ['toggleDrawer']),

    // toggleDrawer: {
    //     get() {
    //         return this.drawer
    //     },
    //     set(newVal) {
    //         this.$store.commit('custom/setDrawer', newVal)
    //     }
    // }
}
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.imgCursor {
  cursor: pointer;
}

</style>>




<!-- <v-list-item-group
v-model="selectedItem"
color="primary"
>
<v-list-item
  v-for="item in items"
  :key="item.title"
  >
  <v-list-item-icon>
    <v-icon> {{ item.icon }} </v-icon>
  </v-list-item-icon>
  <v-list-item-content>
      <v-list-item-title> {{ item.text }}</v-list-item-title>
  </v-list-item-content>
</v-list-item>
</v-list-item-group> -->
